definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: How Have Land-use Regulations Affected Property values in Oregon?
sentences.chinese: 俄勒岡土地利用條例怎樣影響不動產價值？

sentences.english: Paul cashed in on his real-estate investments.
sentences.chinese: 保羅靠不動產投資賺了錢。

sentences.english: HIRO: Yeah. He used to be a real estate salesperson.
sentences.chinese: 是的，他曾經是不動產銷售員。

sentences.english: A uniform registration system over realties shall be practiced by the state.
sentences.chinese: 國家對不動產實行統一登記制度。

sentences.english: The provisional regulations on the registration of immovable property were officially implemented.
sentences.chinese: 不動產登記暫行條例正式實施。

sentences.english: The government levies taxes on real estate and personal property.
sentences.chinese: 政府徵收不動產和動產稅。

sentences.english: It is now usual to revalue property assets on a more regular basis.
sentences.chinese: 更加頻繁地對不動產進行重新估價如今已很平常。

sentences.english: This paper first introduces the historical evolution of the real property registration system.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先介紹了國內外不動產登記制度的歷史沿革。

sentences.english: The register of the immovables shall be kept by the registration authority.
sentences.chinese: 不動產登記簿由登記機構管理。

sentences.english: Real estate is well up, and I could afford you a pretty handsome price.
sentences.chinese: 不動產大大看漲，我可以給你個好價錢。

sentences.english: First , for pre - sale mortgage real estate mortgage and real estate.
sentences.chinese: 第一，對於預售商品房按揭與不動產抵押。

sentences.english: Other realties and chattels that are in the ownership of collective.
sentences.chinese: 集體所有的其他不動產和動產。

sentences.english: This approach was based on the provision of individual freehold titles to all selected households.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法立足於向所有被選擇的家庭提供不動產產權。

sentences.english: Real property is land and things immovably attached to the land.
sentences.chinese: 不動產指的是土地以及土地上附着物。

sentences.english: Land is referred to as realty.

definition: property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
developer (of real estate, a commercial product etc)
